en: Peppa and her family are going out for the day.
zh: 佩奇和家人今天要出去玩。

en: Peppa, George,today we are going to Windy Castle!
zh: 佩奇，乔治，今天我们要去风息堡！

en: It's a castle on a very high hill!
zh: 是座落在高山上的一座城堡！

en: Windy Castle sounds like a boring thing for boys.
zh: 风息堡听起来像是男孩子喜欢玩的，有点无聊。

en: There's a great view from the top of Windy Castle.
zh: 风息堡上面的风景非常美。

en: You can even see Granny and Grandpa's house!
zh: 你甚至还可以看到奶奶和爷爷的房子！

en: I'll map-read and Mummy Pig will drive.
zh: 我来看地图，猪妈妈负责开车。

en: When you map-read,we always get lost and you get grumpy.
zh: 你看地图，我们总会迷路，然后你会变得很焦躁。

en: We will not get lost and I will not get grumpy.
zh: 我们是不会迷路的，我也不会变焦躁。

en: Would you like to play a game?

zh: 是的。让我们玩“我要你猜”！

en: Daddy Pig has to secretly look at something and the others have to guess what it is.
zh: 猪爸爸偷偷看个东西然后让其他人来猜猜是什么。

en: I spy with my little eye, something colored ''red''.
zh: 我的小眼睛看到一样红色的东西。
红色？我的裙子！它是红色的！
对了！是我们红色的汽车。

en: My go. I spy with my little eye, something ''blue''
zh: 我来。我的小眼睛看到一个蓝色的东西。

en: Is it something in the car?
The sky! The blue sky! I win.
zh: 天空啊！蓝色的天空！我赢了.

en: Daddy Pig? Do you know where we are?
zh: 猪爸爸？你知道我们在哪吗？

en: I know exactly where we are.
zh: 我很确切地知道我们在哪。

en: Although... this road doesn't look the same as it does on the map.
zh: 虽然。。。这路看起来和地图上的不太一样。

en: So how do we get to Windy Castle from here?
zh: 那么我们从这里怎么去风息堡？

en: I know, we can ring Granny and Grandpa.
zh: 我知道了，我们可以打电话给猪奶奶和猪爷爷。

en: There's no need to ring Granny and Grandpa.
zh: 没有必要打电话给猪奶奶和猪爷爷。

en: I'll get us to Windy Castle, if it takes me all day.
zh: 我会让大家到达风息堡的，即使花上一整天。

en: Grandpa Pig,we've got a bit lost on the way to Windy Castle.
zh: 猪爷爷，我们在去风息堡的路上有点迷路了。

en: Is Daddy Pig doing the map-reading?
zh: 是不是猪爸爸在看地图啊？

en: Yes, Daddy Pig is doing the map-reading.
And he's a bit grumpy at the moment.
keep on the main road until you see Windy Castle up ahead.
zh: 你们只要沿着主路一直开，就会看到风息堡了。

en: We follow the main road and look out for Windy Castle.
zh: 我们沿着主路开，就会看到风息堡了。

en: Come on, car! You can make it!
Peppa and her family have arrived at Windy Castle.
zh: 佩奇和家人到达风息堡了。

en: Let's go inside. The view from the top is fantastic!
zh: 我们进去吧。城堡顶上的风景美极了！

en: Mummy, is that Granny and Grandpa's house?
zh: 妈妈，那是不是奶奶和爷爷的房子？

en: Let's take a look through the telescope.
zh: 让我们用望远镜看看吧。

en: Yes, but you must let George look next.
zh: 可以，但你看完就得让乔治看。

en: The telescope makes everything look bigger.
I can see Granny and Grandpa!
zh: 我可以看到奶奶和爷爷了！

en: George is waving at Granny and Grandpa Pig.
zh: 乔治在对着奶奶和爷爷挥手。

en: Granny and Grandpa are too far away to see you waving!
zh: 奶奶和爷爷离得太远了看不到你在挥手的！

en: I know! We can ring them!
zh: 我知道了！我们可以打电话给他们！

en: Grandpa Pig! We can see you from Windy Castle!
zh: 猪爷爷！我们可以从风息堡看到你们！

en: Granny and Grandpa are waving at us!
zh: 奶奶和爷爷正朝着我们挥手呢！
